decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures with powerful synergies and efficient removal spells to maintain board presence and pressure opponents quickly. It combines strong artifact creatures with vehicles like Heart of Kiran to create a fast, aggressive strategy that can quickly overwhelm opponents with a mix of creatures and burn spells. The deck also utilizes cards like Scrapheap Scrounger and Toolcraft Exemplar to consistently apply pressure and keep opponents on the defensive, while cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Archangel Avacyn provide disruptive threats that can swing the game in your favor.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Gift of Paradise and Weirding Wood to cast powerful late-game threats like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and World Breaker. Control spells like Fumigate and Descend upon the Sinful help to keep the board clear until you can establish your dominant board presence. The deck also includes ways to gain life and draw cards for added value. Overall, the strategy revolves around ramping up mana and controlling the board until you can overwhelm your opponent with powerful creatures.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and efficient removal spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. With a mix of powerful creatures like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Scrapheap Scrounger, as well as versatile removal options such as Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push, this deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain board control. The inclusion of vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester provide additional ways to push damage through and protect key creatures. This deck aims to close out games quickly with a well-rounded aggressive strategy.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on quickly playing low-cost creatures like Thraben Inspector and Matter Reshaper, while utilizing Eldrazi Displacer and Thought-Knot Seer to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Selfless Spirit provides protection for your creatures, and Archangel Avacyn acts as a powerful finisher. Removal spells like Stasis Snare and Warping Wail help control the board, while cards like Cast Out and Declaration in Stone deal with problematic threats. The deck also includes utility lands like Aether Hub and Scavenger Grounds, as well as Shefet Dunes for additional aggression.

The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to utilize the synergy between +1/+1 counters and energy generation to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. Cards like Winding Constrictor and Nissa, Voice of Zendikar help to boost the power of your creatures, while cards like Walking Ballista and Longtusk Cub can quickly grow in size. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to deal with opposing threats, providing a well-rounded strategy that aims to win the game through early pressure and efficient creature combat.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive Mono Black Aggro strategy. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Cryptbreaker and Dread Wanderer, along with powerful lords like Lord of the Accursed and Diregraf Colossus, this deck aims to flood the board with threats. Removal spells like Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push help clear the way for attacks, while cards like Dark Salvation and Liliana's Mastery provide additional value and buffs to the creature army. Kalitas, Traitor of Ghet offers additional disruption and graveyard hate, making this deck a formidable force in the Standard format.

The main concept of the deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. By deploying efficient creatures like Falkenrath Gorger, Earthshaker Khenra, and Hazoret the Fervent, along with burn spells like Shock and Incendiary Flow, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and close out the game before they can stabilize. The inclusion of direct damage spells like Abrade and Scavenger Grounds helps deal with threats and disrupt opponent's strategies, while also utilizing lands like Ramunap Ruins and Sunscorched Desert for additional reach.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures with strong abilities such as Glorybringer, Bristling Hydra, and Whirler Virtuoso to quickly overwhelm opponents with a flurry of attacks. Additionally, the deck includes various removal spells like Abrade and Harnessed Lightning to efficiently deal with opposing threats. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for casting spells. By combining aggressive creatures with removal and mana fixing, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and maintain board control to secure victory.

The focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. By combining powerful artifact creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Heart of Kiran with versatile removal like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. Cards like Archangel Avacyn and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provide additional threats and support for the aggressive game plan. The inclusion of Aethersphere Harvester and Scrapheap Scrounger offer additional resilience and staying power in longer games.

This deck focuses on aggressive play and efficiently putting pressure on the opponent with a mix of powerful creatures and removal spells. By utilizing cards like Archangel Avacyn, Toolcraft Exemplar, and Heart of Kiran, players can quickly build a threatening board presence. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thought-Knot Seer and Fatal Push to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the goal is to apply consistent pressure and maintain board control to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

The main focus of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly swarm the board with powerful creatures such as Thought-Knot Seer and Archangel Avacyn to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck includes cards like Eldrazi Displacer and Walking Ballista to control the board and deal with threats, while cards like Spatial Contortion and Stasis Snare provide removal and disruption. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy, with a mix of Plains, Aether Hub, Shefet Dunes, and Spawning Bed to ensure consistent casting of spells and creatures.

The deck is focused on quickly dealing damage to the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and burn spells. It aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game and finish them off before they can stabilize. Key cards include Falkenrath Gorger, Hazoret the Fervent, and Earthshaker Khenra, which all have hasty abilities that allow them to attack immediately. Additionally, the deck includes burn spells like Shock and Abrade to clear the way for its creatures to attack.

This Aggro Red Deck Wins deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with low-cost, efficient creatures and burn spells. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game, utilizing cards like Hazoret the Fervent, Ahn-Crop Crasher, and Bomat Courier to deal damage quickly. Burn spells like Incendiary Flow and Abrade offer additional direct damage and removal options. The deck's mana base is streamlined with a heavy focus on Mountains, allowing for consistent casting of spells and aggressive gameplay.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and burn spells, using creatures like Hazoret the Fervent, Ahn-Crop Crasher, and Earthshaker Khenra to apply pressure early on. The deck also utilizes cards like Abade and Shock to deal direct damage to the opponent's creatures or life total. With a low mana curve and a high creature count, this deck aims to end the game quickly and efficiently before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Bristling Hydra, Glorybringer, and Longtusk Cub to quickly pressure the opponent. It also utilizes energy cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Servant of the Conduit to generate energy for powerful effects. The deck includes removal spells like Abrade, Harnessed Lightning, and Magma Spray to deal with opposing threats. The mana base is optimized for consistent land drops and includes a mix of dual lands and energy-generating lands. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures like Longtusk Cub, Bristling Hydra, and Glorybringer to pressure the opponent. It also includes versatile threats like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and The Scarab God for additional reach. The deck aims to maintain a steady stream of energy with cards like Servant of the Conduit and Whirler Virtuoso, while also having removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Abrade to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's multicolored requirements for a consistent and powerful aggressive strategy.
